mapper.select: SELECT a.*,(select count (b.pro_no) from board b where a.pro_no=b.pro_no) as review_count, (SELECT AVG(b.b_eval) FROM board b WHERE b.pro_no = a.pro_no) AS RATING_AVG FROM ( SELECT pro_no, pro_price, pro_bannerimg, pro_wish, pro_name, pro_sellcount, pro_bizname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY pro_sellcount DESC, pro_wish DESC ) AS rnum FROM product) a WHERE rnum between #{page}*8+1 and #{page}*8+8

SELECT i.pro_no, i.i_quantity, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, p.pro_bannerIMG FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i_date DESC) AS rnum FROM item_cart t) WHERE rnum <= 5) i INNER JOIN product p ON i.pro_no = p.pro_no WHERE i.m_no = #{m_no}

select a.*, (SELECT AVG(b.b_eval) FROM board b WHERE b.pro_no = a.pro_no) AS rating_avg from (select p.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.pro_hit DESC) AS rnum FROM product p where p_c_no between #{categoryNum}*10 and #{categoryNum}*10 + 9) a where rnum between #{pageNum}*8+1 and #{pageNum}*8+8
select * from (select p.*, rownum rn from product p where p.pro_name like #{keyword}) where rn<4
